comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Captain Arthur Reginald French, the 5th Baron de Freyne of Coolhaven (1879-1915). He apparently joined the US Army "to gain experience of the world." He died in battle during WWI. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_French,_5th_Baron_de_Freyne

comment._content: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4390168006/ is a picture of his wife.
